sorcer.core.invoker

Class OptInvoker<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • sorcer.vfe.Observable
      • sorcer.core.invoker.Invoker<T>
        • sorcer.core.invoker.OptInvoker<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Evaluation<T>, Evaluator<T>, Identifiable, Invocation<T>, Scopable, EvaluationModel, Observer

    public class OptInvoker<T>
extends Invoker<T>
    The option Var. There is a single target invoker that executes if the condition is true (like if... then).
    Author:
    Mike Sobolewski
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
